CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 6 reads: "1. Electric Products, Inc. representatives Samuel McMahon, National Record Mart, and Fred H. Levenson of Discount, Inc. discuss one of the Motorola prizes given away."
TitMainTitle: Samuel McMahon and Fred H. Levenson standing in Motorola television demonstration center in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Televisions--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
